name: Rainbow Moon PS3 Player Special Offer
name_original: Rainbow Moon PS3 Player Special Offer
description:
Purchase Rainbow Moon for the PlayStation®Vita system at a 50% discount if you already own Rainbow Moon for the PlayStation®3 system. This special offer is available for a limited time only.

The indie role-playing hit Rainbow Moon returns for the PlayStation®Vita system with Cross-Save support and numerous updates!

Explore a fascinating world and fight nasty creatures in turn-based battles. Visit towns and shop for new equipment and upgrades. Six playable characters await you in an addictive game that lasts more than 40 hours.

“RPG fans, this one is not to be missed” – Push Square (9/10)

“...Rainbow Moon is put together fantastically well” – PSXExtreme.com (8.7/10)

“Rainbow Moon is a lot of fun, and RPG fanatics should play it” – IGN (8/10)

Additional features:

• Complete all optional content to extend game play up to 100 hours and beyond
• Earn more than 50 trophies, including a prestigious platinum trophy
• Exchange saved data between your PlayStation®Vita system and PlayStation®3 system

Rainbow Moon

Compatible with PlayStation®Vita only.
Gameplay requires PlayStation®Vita memory card (sold separately).
340KB minimum space required
1 Player
